name: Farm Mechanic Simulator 2015
description: Be your own boss! Enjoy your new career at an authentic farm repair service with Farm Mechanic Simulator 2015. It's better than reality!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Pentium Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB (GeForce 8600 GT or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Core Quad Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB or higher (GeForce 550 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c
